mapper.select: select id, username, operation, time, method, params, ip, create_time, location from tb_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_log(username, operation, time, method, params, ip, create_time, location) values (#{username}, #{operation}, #{time}, #{method}, #{params}, #{ip}, #{createTime}, #{location})

insert into tb_log(username, operation, time, method, params, ip, create_time, location) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.operation}, #{entity.time}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.params}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.location})

insert into tb_log(username, operation, time, method, params, ip, create_time, location) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.operation}, #{entity.time}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.params}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.location})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), operation = values(operation), time = values(time), method = values(method), params = values(params), ip = values(ip), create_time = values(create_time), location = values(location)
mapper.update:
update tb_log
username = #{username},
operation = #{operation},
time = #{time},
method = #{method},
params = #{params},
ip = #{ip},
create_time = #{createTime},
location = #{location},
where id = #{id}
